doc:
Steve Staley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Staley 0 Steve Staley also known as Steve Cannon, is an American voice actor known for providing voices for Japanese anime and video games. Some of his notable roles include Shūhei Hisagi and Tōshirō Hitsugaya in Bleach, Daisuke Aurora in Heat Guy J, Shiro Amada in Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team, Moondoggie in Eureka Seven, Kadaj in Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children, Neji Hyuga/Shibuki in Naruto, and Eiji Kikumaru in The Prince of Tennis. Steve_Staley also known as Steve_Cannon , is an_American_voice_actor known for providing voices for Japanese_anime_and_video_games . Some of his_notable_roles include Shūhei_Hisagi and Tōshirō_Hitsugaya in Bleach , Daisuke_Aurora in Heat_Guy_J , Shiro_Amada in Mobile_Suit_Gundam : The_08th_MS_Team , Moondoggie in Eureka_Seven , Kadaj in Final_Fantasy_VII : Advent_Children , Neji_Hyuga/Shibuki in Naruto , and Eiji_Kikumaru in The_Prince of Tennis .
